CODENAME: used in the buy command.id: the order in which items should be shown
CODENAME: used in the buy command.page: page to show this item on
CODENAME: used in the buy command.title: title to show
CODENAME: used in the buy command.buytitle: title shown in buy (default = codename with first name capitalized)
CODENAME: used in the buy command.price: the currency price of this item
CODENAME: used in the buy command.summary: a short summary of what this item does/is

statistics.key: name of settingsGateway.User key to modify (must exist)

CODENAME: used in the buy command.titleInValue: whether to show the title in the field value or not (default = true)
CODENAME: used in the buy command.affectSales: whether this item should be affected by sales or not (default = true)
CODENAME: used in the buy command.statExtra: an extra piece of text that should be added to the statistic show number (default = '')
CODENAME: used in the buy command.reverse: whether this item upgrades in reverse, for maximums (default = false)
CODENAME: used in the buy command.item: if this is an item (default = false)

safe.summary: All those bitches tryna rob ya?
